name: Thunder
tagline: Large-scale neural data analysis with Spark
body:
### Factor Analysis in Thunder (A CMU 15-418 Final Project)
Our goal for this project is to implement factor analysis in the distributed machine learning framework Thunder.

### Goals and Deliverables
An implementation of factor analysis in Thunder which is able to outperform an optimized implementation on a single machine.
